lyrics:
8 contributorsprice to play lyricsverse 1
fail to see
how destructive we can be
taking without giving back
till the damage can be seen

prechorus
can you see
can you see

chorus
the more you take the more you blame
for everything still feels the same
the more you hurt the more you scream
the price you pay to play the game
then all you see and all you gain
and all you step on with no shame
there are no rules no one to blame
the price to play the game

verse 2
apathy
the chosen way to be
blindly look the other way
while you waste away with me
see staind liveget tickets as low as 42you might also likeprechorus
